content.rendered:
Introducing our signature fresh flower heart arrangement, exclusive to LULLY & ROSE.

Our flower heart is thoughtfully curated with a selection of dainty fresh florals and berries, adorned with delicate moss detailing, reflecting our heartfelt dedication. It’s the ultimate expression of love, offering a distinctive and romantic way to gift flowers, that embodies both elegance and sentimentality.

Presented in our signature gift box and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The flower heart you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

AVAILABLE FOR VALENTINES DAY & MOTHERS DAY ONLY!

Floral Heart size: 25cm Diameter approx.
GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
